website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use hydrometer and a good value for the money.
pros: Easy to use with clear directions
Use it to track fermentation and measure the alcohol level, gravity, and brix of wine and beer
cons: Works only for beer and wine

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job for wine
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job for wine. Came with the temperature correction chart. I keep that with my life book. I broke the last one and this was a great replacement. Recommended and I would buy again ! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: a2zllc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: The multi-colored band makes this hydrometer much easier to read than the one it's replacing. The protective case it comes in is sturdily built and well padded. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable, could use larger #'s for us old dudes.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't broke them yet and this is my 4th one in a year. All my beer seems to come out at 5.5% but it's not the hydrometer's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: Homecooking
customer_reviews.text: Been using pretty often now. It's easy to read. I got other ones before and it's not accurate anymore after a couple use. This is still good. Haven't had any problems. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Irene K

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with these things. They break easy and that is of no fault to the manufacturer. Love the different colors on the scale. Makes it easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Craib

customer_reviews.title: Just by a refractomoter
customer_reviews.text: Hydrometers work and they do what they are supposed to do but just spend a few dollars more and buy a refractometer. It's so much easier to use and is WAY more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I make mead. I like the colors on this hydrometer. I just wish I wasn’t such a fumble fingers.
